title: Murder in the Clouds cinema slide
creator_credit: D. Lederman and Warner Bros Pictures
credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Murder in the Clouds Mystery rides the air lanes Lyle Talbot Anne Dvorak Gordon Westcott Gunn Slide for general exhibition The two sheets of glass are held together using Gunn’s Slide branded tape: Gunn’s Slide, 9 Collins Place Melb. Cent. 2736
